name: Abubakar A. Haruna
tweet: President Muhammdu Buhari was booed by residents of Maiduguri during his sympathy visit to the area. The residents who came out early lined up on both sides of the road along the airport way, shouting in Hausa, 'Ba ma so' roughly means: 'we don't want.'  https://t.co/qQjRfFYwjH

tweet: Finally, the people of Maiduguri spoke their minds and Buhari gets a taste of his own medicine. This should bother the leadership of the APC, if their main man can be booed, I wonder how they will sell the next candidates to the people.
